answers.answer: Depression is a symptom of hypothyroidism.  You are gaining weight most likely because you aren't on enough medication, are on the wrong thyroid medication, or as a side effect of one of the other medications.Thyroid medication does not cause weight to drop off if you are hypothyroid. Someone that isn't hypo might lose from the medication. What the thyroid med does for someone who is hypo is it allows you to stop gaining weight and any weight gain can be lost with diet and exercise.  It can take months to years to lose the weight gained by the condition.  I gained over 50 pounds with the condition and have only managed to lose about 25 pounds so far and this has taken me 8 years to do so.What thyroid medication are you on?  Most are put on a T4 medication. The goal on this medication is to have a morning TSH around 1.0.If depression and fatigue continue after having a TSH around 1.0, then its time to look into adding some T3.

question: Hi I am new on here and here is my story, I have my blood work done every three months for the last year in July of 2008 everything was borderline but basically ok. I was on Prozac and Wellbutrin for depression because I wanted to sleep all the time.  I didn't feel depressed but I took them anyway. Well I gained 40 pounds, My doctor was upset and I told her I eat normal, but was tired all the time,  The antidepressants were prescribed by another doctor btw. So she had me get a complete blood lab that concluded hypothyroidism, high triglycerides  high cholesterol, and diabetes, she also put me on meds for high blood pressure. I am not taking the antidepressants, and working out, I am managing to stay awake during the day,  I also went to a dietitian and am following the ada diet of 1600 calories.I go to the gym and do the treadmill, elliptical machines and weights.  I am 46, 5'3'' and weigh 23, I am big boned and still fit into my size 18  I have gained 5 pounds this month and am starting to sleep more again.  my grandmother had her thyroid taken out and died 5 years later should the doctor do more tests or should i go to an endiconolgist, I have had girlfriends say that with my thyroid medication the wieght will drop off. Am I doing something wrong?  Any suggestions will be helpfull
